extDescription: Chrome平臺最好的主頁，擁有令人震驚的主題，如閃電般迅捷的小部件，並可任意定制。
newtabDescription: Chrome平臺最好的主頁，現支持新選項卡。擁有令人震驚的主題，如閃電般迅捷的小部件，並可任意定制。
column_to_grid_warning: 您選擇將選項卡的布局方式從基於列的布局改為基於網格的布局。如果您確認繼續將會失去您所有專欄，然後一切掛件都將被移動到左上角。您確定要這樣做嗎？
grid_to_column_warning: 您選擇將一個選項卡從基於網格佈局更改為基於列的佈局。如果您繼續，您將丟失所有您的小部件定位 ；一切都將被移動到新的選項卡的第一列。您確定你想要這樣做嗎？
storage_warning:
您已經使用90%以上的可用總同步空間 。
如果達到極限，iChrome 將停止同步您的資料並可能停止工作。您可以通過刪除無需使用的自訂主題、 筆記和待辦事項清單以縮小您使用空間的量。

voice.missed: 抱歉，沒有聽到。再試一次

general.search_desc: This is the URL that the search box will submit searches to. Put %s where the search query should go
general.profile_desc: This is the image shown at the right of the toolbar.  It gets auto-populated from your Google profile
general.name: 名稱
general.name_desc: This is used for the Google+ link in the toolbar.  It also gets auto-populated from your Google profile
general.links_desc: Here you can choose which links will show in the right section of the toolbar:
general.guide_desc: Reshow the guide that was shown when iChrome was first installed

visual.align_desc: This will change the alignment of the widget columns
visual.logo_desc: This is the image shown at the left of the toolbar. The default is /images/logo.svg
visual.toolbar_desc: This controls the style of the toolbar.  It can either appear normally or as an out of the way button
visual.animation_desc: This setting lets you enable or disable the slide-in animation that runs when you load the page

specific.name: Tab Name
specific.delete_disallowed: You cannot delete the only remaining tab.
specific.delete_confirm:
Are you really sure you want to delete this tab?
This action is irreversible, all data from all widgets in the tab will be permanently lost.

advanced.background_desc: Click the swatch to select a color
advanced.search_label: Open search results in a new tab
advanced.backup_desc:
To backup: Click the Backup button and copy the text that appears in the field below.
To restore: Paste the text you saved or copied before and click the Restore button.
advanced.restore_error: An error occurred while trying to parse the provided data, please make sure you entered the EXACT text you backed up.
advanced.restore_confirm:
Are you really, really sure you want to do this?
This will overwrite all local and synced data, there is no backup and no way to undo this.  You will lose your ENTIRE current configuration on all computers signed into this Google account.
advanced.css_desc:
You can use this field to customize almost any visual part of iChrome using CSS (for a definition please see the MDN).

Since this will be synced, you can only enter a maximum of 1000 characters, including whitespace.
advanced.reset_confirm:
Are you really sure you want to reset iChrome?
This will erase all local and synced data, there is no backup and no way to undo this.  You will lose your ENTIRE current configuration on all computers signed into this Google account.

store.instructions: Drag and drop any size onto your homepage

widgets.delete_confirm:
Are you really sure you want to delete this widget?
This action is irreversible; all data from this widget will be permanently lost.

settings.title: Widget Title
settings.title_placeholder: Enter a widget title or leave blank to hide
settings.account_help:
If you're signed into multiple accounts, this is the "authuser=" value.

For example, if you're signed into two accounts, jsmith1@gmail.com and jsmith2@gmail.com, the "authuser" value for jsmith2@gmail.com would be 1 since it's the second account (counting from zero) that you're signed into.

themes.title: Themes

edit.title: Edit Theme
edit.name: Theme Name
edit.image_help:
Uploaded images cannot be synced between computers.

If this is important to you, please upload your image to a service such as imgur. Then copy and paste the URL ending with an extension (i.e. .jpg) and paste it into the field on the left.
edit.cache_error: An error occurred while trying to cache the image you provided, please double-check the URL.
edit.upload_error: An error occurred while trying to upload the file you provided, please make sure that it's a reasonable size and an image.

themes.author: By
themes.cached: This theme has been cached and is available offline
themes.random: This theme displays a random image every time you load the page
themes.random_daily: This theme displays an image picked randomly every day
themes.sunrise_sunset: This theme displays an image based on the time of day
themes.feed: This theme displays an image selected daily from an external feed
themes.delete_confirm:
Are you really sure you would like to delete this theme?
This action is irreversible; the entire theme will be permanently lost.
themes.delete_error: An error occurred while trying to delete the theme.  Please try again later.
themes.feed_error: Something went wrong while trying to fetch the feed.  Please try again later.
themes.cache_error: An error occurred while trying to cache the theme.  Please try again later

slide1.title: Welcome to iChrome!
slide1.line1: If you want iChrome as your start page, you'll need to set the URL of this page in your settings (instructions). Otherwise, if you want it as a new tab or both home and new tab pages, please install iChrome New Tab instead.
slide1.newtab_line1: If you want iChrome to only show when you start Chrome and not every time you open a new tab please install the main iChrome extension instead of this one.
slide1.line2: This introduction is only 3 slides long and will give a quick overview of how to do basic things in iChrome.  When you're ready hit the next arrow at the right.

slide2.title: Widgets
slide2.line1: Widgets are the core of iChrome.  You can configure and move them using the wrench and handle icons shown when hovering at the top right.  To remove one, start dragging it and drop it onto the red bar that appears.
slide2.line2: New widgets can be added by clicking the Widgets item under the menu at the top right of the page (shown in the next slide).

slide3.title: Customizing
slide3.line1: You can change almost anything else you'd want to via the menu at the top right.  There you can configure the way your page looks, how iChrome works and get new widgets.
slide3.line2: Other things you can do include creating individual tabs, each with themes and widgets of their own, custom themes, or configuring the tiniest thing like what links are shown in the toolbar.
